review: On first install I received a message that chromecast was having difficulty gaining access to my wifi (I don't remember the "exact" phrase that popped up on my tv screen but that was the gist of it). Then Chromecast reported it found a work around of its own (again that wasn't the exact phrase, but the gist of the message).I was then able to cast a prime video playing on my bedroom laptop to my bedroom tv with the chromecast installed on it. HOWEVER it then knocked my Roku3 & Micca Speck that were/are connected to my Living room TV out of service. Now I have nothing :-(Update: My Roku came back online and my Micca started to perform as usual the next day, so I changed my 1 star review to 3 stars.
